mapper.insert: INSERT INTO userinfo (userid, username, gender, age, birth, company, school, phone, email, signature) VALUES (#{userid}, #{username}, #{gender}, #{age}, #{birth}, #{company}, #{school}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{signature});
mapper.update: UPDATE userinfo SET username = #{username}, gender = #{gender}, age = #{age}, birth = #{birth}, company = #{company}, school = #{school}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, signature = #{signature} WHERE userid = #{userid};
